Irene Temple

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: Charles Stearns
  3. Location of Family: Beaver City, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Holdrege, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 10
  7. Date of Birth: 1917, IL
  8. Gender: female
  9. Notes: Later lived with Eurschell G. and Ruby S. Beeler.
  10. Source: National Orphan Train Complex; 1930 United States Federal Census; Holdrege newspaper (unidentified), 17 November 1927.
